commands.name: az stack-hci cluster identity assign
commands.syntax:
az stack-hci cluster identity assign --cluster-name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az stack-hci cluster identity remove
commands.syntax:
az stack-hci cluster identity remove --cluster-name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
